openings.additionalPlain:
Why Voyage SMS?
Voyage SMS is growing exponentially and looking for passionate self-starters to join the team. Our team is young, hungry, innovative, and most importantly, fun. We will give you all the tools necessary to meet your goals – and we will celebrate you meeting your goals in an incredibly fast-paced, fun, unique, and differentiated environment.

openings.descriptionPlain:
Who We Are:
Voyage SMS is the most advanced next-gen message commerce platform built by eCommerce marketing leaders for eCommerce marketers. 

We are not afraid of troves of data, the complex or the unknown. We embrace an ambitious roadmap while delivering the highest quality product available in the market.

We believe B2B apps should be design forward and that business users (humans) should expect as delightful a user experience as any other top app on the App Store.

At Voyage, your work will touch the hands of leading eCommerce marketers running $1B+ brands. You will be at the forefront of best-in-class marketing technology ✔️

We are hyper-focused on enabling clients to send the right to the right consumers at the right time. Voyage is changing the way eCommerce brands use SMS – transforming traditional retention marketing into a pure commerce channel that will drive up to 30% of brands’ revenue. 

Voyage is trailblazing the market with faster product innovation than any other marketing platform, and currently powers SMS for leading brands such as Chums, Birthdate Co, Lumin, and Lokai.

Voyage SMS is looking for a detail-oriented, passionate, and reliable team member for the Business Admin role.

Who We Are:
Voyage SMS is the most advanced next-gen message commerce platform built by eCommerce marketing leaders for eCommerce marketers.

We are not afraid of troves of data, the complex or the unknown. We embrace an ambitious roadmap while delivering the highest quality product available in the market.

We believe B2B apps should be design forward and that business users (humans) should expect as delightful a user experience as any other top app on the App Store.

At Voyage, your work will touch the hands of leading eCommerce marketers running $1B+ brands. You will be at the forefront of best-in-class marketing technology ✔️

We are hyper-focused on enabling clients to send the right to the right consumers at the right time. Voyage is changing the way eCommerce brands use SMS – transforming traditional retention marketing into a pure commerce channel that will drive up to 30% of brands’ revenue.

Voyage is trailblazing the market with faster product innovation than any other marketing platform, and currently powers SMS for leading brands such as Chums, Birthdate Co, Lumin, and Lokai.

Voyage SMS is looking for a detail-oriented, passionate, and reliable team member for the Business Admin role.

lists.content:
• Work directly with the CEO, broader executive team, and department heads on cross-functional responsibilities and special projects.
  • Contribute to special projects across Marketing, Product, and Operations.
  • Oversee Business Operations tasks including payroll for full-time employees, US contractors, and international contractors; manage employee onboarding tasks; manage relationships with external firms and partners; provide support to the CEO and executive team around interview scheduling and other hiring-related processes.
  • Identify process automation and streamlining opportunities; develop and implement scalable processes around all HR and admin related tasks.
  • Opportunity for growth into a Business Operations role as the company scales.

• An organized, detail oriented problem solver - you're willing to take initiative to produce high quality results and ensure smooth, efficient operation.
  • A clear communicator with excellent interpersonal skills - you have experience with effectively interfacing and collaborating with key internal stakeholders and executives.
  • Technically savvy, and can quickly adapt to new technology. Experience working with HR/admin platforms including Gusto, Lever, and GSuite a plus.
  • Excited about scaling processes, driving cross-functional team support, and executing on core business tasks efficiently and effectively.

openings.descriptionPlain:
Who We Are:
Voyage SMS is the most advanced next-gen message commerce platform built by eCommerce marketing leaders for eCommerce marketers. 

We are not afraid of troves of data, the complex or the unknown. We embrace an ambitious roadmap while delivering the highest quality product available in the market.

We believe B2B apps should be design forward and that business users (humans) should expect as delightful a user experience as any other top app on the App Store.

At Voyage, your work will touch the hands of leading eCommerce marketers running $1B+ brands. You will be at the forefront of best-in-class marketing technology ✔️

We are hyper-focused on enabling clients to send the right to the right consumers at the right time. Voyage is changing the way eCommerce brands use SMS – transforming traditional retention marketing into a pure commerce channel that will drive up to 30% of brands’ revenue. 

Voyage is trailblazing the market with faster product innovation than any other marketing platform, and currently powers SMS for leading brands such as Chums, Birthdate Co, Lumin, and Lokai.

Voyage is looking for a customer focused, tech savvy Client Success Manager to help drive revenue and customer retention in our mission to build the first commerce messaging platform. CSMs are responsible for all aspects of post sales client activity and relationships.

Voyage is a fast-paced, dynamic environment. You must have the ability to think and move quickly, prioritize as needed, and be comfortable with change and ambiguity.

Voyage is trailblazing the market with faster product innovation than any other marketing platform, and currently powers SMS for leading brands such as Chums, Birthdate Co, Lumin, and Lokai.

Voyage is looking for a customer focused, tech savvy Client Success Manager to help drive revenue and customer retention in our mission to build the first commerce messaging platform. CSMs are responsible for all aspects of post sales client activity and relationships.

Voyage is a fast-paced, dynamic environment. You must have the ability to think and move quickly, prioritize as needed, and be comfortable with change and ambiguity.

lists.text: How you will help bring success to Voyage
lists.content:
• Work closely with internal teams and clients to ensure success in driving product adoption and platform utilization
  • Obtain a deep, technical understanding of the Voyage platform in order to provide answers and develop solutions and use cases for clients
  • Ongoing, detail-oriented management with new and existing customers to deepen and broaden relationships, and build their loyalty and confidence with the Voyage platform
  • Lead client calls and present account performance to demonstrate the impact and ROI of product usage
  • Conduct ongoing review of client accounts in order to make recommendations and ensure that customers are utilizing the Voyage platform to its full potential based on clients' business objectives and vision
  • Understand clients’ business objectives and vision to always deliver value that is most important to them
  • Set proper customer expectations based on knowledge of the Voyage platform, scope of relationship, and contractual requirement
  • Work with sales/business development, product, and engineering to resolve client issues and provide client feedback in order to continuously optimize the Voyage experience for clients
  • Maintain up-to-date knowledge and strategy of company initiatives, industry trends

• You've had 2+ years of CSM experience and/or you've held responsibilities managing clients
  • You have strong communication and interpersonal skills – you always keep customers in the loop and are able to articulate responses in a clear, concise, and positive manner
  • You have the ability to think outside the box to find the best solutions
  • You're proactive and can work to figure out an answer
  • You have had and are comfortable holding conversations around pricing, upsell opportunities and contracting
  • You are analytical and know how to use data to develop and enrich recommendations and solutions
  • You're highly organized
  • You're enthusiastic with a customer-first attitude

lists.content:
• Track and maintain email schedule from various cross-functional stakeholders (Marketing, Product, Client Success, Sales)
  • Execute and coordinate email sends
  • Track and maintain social schedule
  • Coordinate and execute social posts
  • Track and report on analytics for email and social media
  • Manage CMS for blog and email
  • Research/outlining for marketing content

lists.content:
• Work with a wide range of systems, processes and technologies to own and solve problems from end-to-end
  • Architect and build new features for internal and external users while anticipating strategic and scaling-related challenges via thoughtful long-term planning
  • Uphold our high engineering standards and bring consistency to the many codebases and processes you will encounter
  • Manage releases and deployment pipelines across the organization
  • Monitor systems performance and infrastructure uptime to ensure a consistent and reliable user experience
  • Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization such as product, design, operations, and client success

• 5+ years of working experience as a software engineer
  • BS in Computer Science or engineering degree highly preferred
  • Experience as a generalist working on both the frontend, backend, and anything it takes to solve problems and delight users both internally and externally
  • The ability to stitch together many different services and processes even if you have not worked with them before
  • Enjoyment in working with a globally diverse group of people with different areas of expertise
  • Skills for upholding best practices in engineering, security, and design
  • Ability to set technical and cultural standards for engineers

• Idiomatic JavaScript, React (Context API), and TypeScript (7+ years)
  • Object Oriented Development in C#, .NET Core (5+ years)
  • REST, Design Patterns knowledge, and experience with event-based architectures
  • Query design and optimization in SQL (Postgres) and RDBMS performance monitoring
  • Deep experience in AWS services and configuration (Route53, S3, EC2, RDS, Lambdas etc.)
  • CI/CD configuration and management in AzureDevOps (or similar)
  • GitHub (Gitflow), JIRA and Slack

Summary:   
The Technical Account Manager will have the opportunity to engage directly with our customer services team and clients in order to support, troubleshoot, and overall evangelize the Voyage Platform. TAM’s are the front line technical resource for both internal account management teams and our clients.  A successful TAM may come to us with a variety of backgrounds but should have strong communication and technical skills as well as the ability to learn, work with and understand a complicated variety of software tools, platforms and databases.  Communication and Speed are two of our most important attributes; we work fast and communicate often to let our customers know they’re always top of mind. Candidate must be willing to relocate to Los Angeles.

Summary:

TAM’s are the front line technical resource for both internal account management teams and our clients.  A successful TAM may come to us with a variety of backgrounds but should have strong communication and technical skills as well as the ability to learn, work with and understand a complicated variety of software tools, platforms and databases.  Communication and Speed are two of our most important attributes; we work fast and communicate often to let our customers know they’re always top of mind. Candidate must be willing to relocate to Los Angeles.

lists.content:
• Support the Account Management team, especially in its goal of increasing adoption by providing best in class support
  • Provide white-glove client support during on-boarding from post-sale to launch with the Voyage platform.
  • Train customers and team members to use our products more effectively in order to drive new revenue.
  • Answer product-related queries from internal and external stakeholders in a timely manner.
  • Maintain customer relationships and ensure customer satisfaction.
  • Collect support information, analyze customer feedback and communicate to developers and stakeholders on product performance and product improvements.
  • Communicate technical concepts to a variety of audiences with varying levels of technical depth.

• Bachelor’s degree in a technical field or related experience.
  • Experience coding in one or more front end programming languages (HTML, CSS, Javascript)
  • Experience with troubleshooting, QA and debugging client issues.
  • Experience with SQL.
  • Ability to juggle multiple competing priorities.
  • Experience working directly with enterprise level customers.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Proven ability to work quickly and independently, think on your feet and outside the box.
  • Track record of going above and beyond for customers and a desire to provide top tier service.
  • Desire to continue expanding your knowledge and skill set as needed.  
  • Willing to relocate to Los Angeles.

• Experience working with e-commerce platforms
  • Experience in the marketing technology space and its various platforms (ESP, SMS Marketing, CDP’s)
